website_summaries.verdict: Adapts to all types of painted surfaces and used by professionals.
pros: We love that this buffing kit doesn't build up debris as it polishes
Designed to create airflow and deliver optimal results for both professionals and novices
Foams up nicely and designed to prevent scratching
cons: Some reports suggest the pads will wear out quickly

customer_reviews.title: Swirl free finish EVERY TIME.
customer_reviews.text: As a professional Detailer and shop owner for 30+ yrs. I have found TCP Global foam pads to be my favorite. The don't gum up and are easy to clean. Also durable for this type of pad.Swirl free finish EVERY TIME.
customer_reviews.author: 1sttexan

customer_reviews.title: Good price and good product
customer_reviews.text: Got tired of trying to find it in the store
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Hook latch is the way to go.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the ease of switching from 1 pad to another.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Dunning

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, works well on Black Paint work
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, works well on Black Paint work, flexible and does not punish a newbie to power polishers like me.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: I'll probably replace it and buy several new ones because it does work nicely.
customer_reviews.text: This pad works fantastically, it didn't hold up for more than two polishes without some wear. I'll probably replace it and buy several new ones because it does work nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond C Cacace

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, used in a professional shop, we think its a keeper.
customer_reviews.text: The material is not cheap, its a firm, but soft, durable foam. Avoid sharp edges, obviously, and you will find that this type of pad is all-round better than wool. The cut is perfect for those who just want to restore a luster, and remove some hazing.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Nate

customer_reviews.title: very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: works well. very happy with purchase. After extended use, the foam came off a little on the edges but this was my fault as I rubbed a corner. I think that these are very good.
customer_reviews.author: Dabber

customer_reviews.title: Another TCP winner!
customer_reviews.text: Looks to be a quality product. Fit perfectly and when it reaches its peak of usefulness, I will look to replace with the same brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best product!
customer_reviews.text: TCP company made great products. I used their buffing pads product & there were great & tough in any buffing job. Its durable because I buff 4 of my cars & the buffing pads that I order from TCP company still in perfect condition. I would highly recommend all their buffing pads to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: aldwin

customer_reviews.title: This is a great pad and is very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pad and is very easy to use. I also believe it is a very safe pad on you paint.
customer_reviews.author: L&P

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great I used it with the blue and black foam pads . It took my fadded black 2005 2500hd paint and made it to were you can clearly see your face in the paint!!! I tried the other types of buffing pads but they all left swirls in the paint and did not give you that deep shine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have a black TRD FJ cruiser that I use ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a black TRD FJ cruiser that I use it for what is was designed, off road. This pad is just what the scratch and shine Dr ordered.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Nice Finishing Pad
customer_reviews.text: Leaves your car paint looking like a mirror, using the correct polish and low rpm.
customer_reviews.author: URCME

customer_reviews.title: Foam pad polish
customer_reviews.text: Yes , of course soft foam pad posilishing special to use whit RACE GLAZE PAINT SEALER.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio E.

customer_reviews.title: Glue binding the pad to the hook & loop failed
customer_reviews.text: The actual foam material seemed to be of good quality and held up well until the glue holding the hook & loop pad melted. The glue melted after only a couple of hours of use. I don't believe I was applying too much pressure or running the DA at a high rpm. The pad then becomes useless.
customer_reviews.author: Keystony

customer_reviews.title: Great Polishing Pads!!
customer_reviews.text: These buffing pads fit off brand buffers which make them a great value. I have yet to try them out to see how they hold up, but would suspect they will be great. TCP sells top quality products and I would recommend them and their products for the admixture as well as professional.
customer_reviews.author: Fishin' Freak

customer_reviews.title: Not for professional use
customer_reviews.text: will not last- ALL TCP pads have failed ,professional rotary buffing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and fairly priced
customer_reviews.text: I haven't put this through very much yet, but it seems well built and didn't fall apart like some others do with minimal use.
customer_reviews.author: Jason G

customer_reviews.title: Green chunks in face.
customer_reviews.text: Sad that they shipped a new foam pad with 3 chunks of foam missing from the face of the pad (one large and two small). The bag was never opened and the front of the package shows the hook and loop side so I suspect the foam pad was not even looked at prior to sending it out. I wish I could return it for the same one without chunks of foam missing from the "extra-fine" foam. I don't even want to try it out. It may work fine but not what I expected. Very disappointed. Please visually inspect the item before shipping.
customer_reviews.author: So Cal Scott

customer_reviews.title: Excelent Service
customer_reviews.text: This company has excelent shipping timing and great prices. I stayed on the internet for 2-3 hours and found these to be the best price so i ordered them. I just received them and they are not cheaply made. The item showed up in around 3-5 days (which is not bad at all)
customer_reviews.author: Blaze

product_meta.title: TCP Global 8" Green Fine Foam Buffing Grip Pad Final Cut Polish Finishing - Hook & Loop
product_meta.description: Polish the Full Spectrum of Coatings using this Complete Professional Buffing and Polishing System! Cut and Buff the most difficult oxidized automotive coatings, hardest clear coats and color sanding scratches with the coarse buffing pads. Bring out the highest level showcar of shine with the ultra-smooth finish polish pads.
feature_bullets: Our Professional 8" Green Pad has light soft polishing foam, designed for finishing and pre-finishing on all paint surfaces.
The Green Finishing Pad works great for use with Paint Sealants and Waxes
Designed with an ultra soft composition for applying all automotive waxes as well as paint sealants
8" Foam DA Polish Pads contain a grip attachment and have curved reinforced plastic backing
Foam Pads made with durable open cell foam which improves airflow

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars72 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
